markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=1855) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 152 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Oracle](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=42)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=1852)

</column>

---

You gain one [oracle feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=14/feats). For meeting its prerequisites, your oracle level is equal to half your level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you gain another oracle feat.
name: Advanced Mysteries
